content:
A TV show called "World Record Breakers"
sent me a certificate of honor a month ago,
declaring me "The Person Who Did the Most Laundry in One Hour."
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊
闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
I just found out
that in my hometown, people give black pineapples as gifts because
"black pineapple" sounds like "I like you" in our local language.
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
How do you like my track jacket?
I bought ten of them in one go, and Glenn even said I bought so many,
he'd throw in a little bonus—
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
No wonder the bakery back home
is making even pineapple cakes in black now. (Lost in thought)
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
Phoenix claw, pork rib rice rolls, egg tarts, custard buns, savory pancakes, beef tongue pastries,
Fried dumplings, "shake-shake" doughnuts, sticky rice wraps, honeycomb tripe, durian pastries, turnip cakes,
Taro pastries, coconut layer cakes, seaweed crab stick rolls—
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
"How much sorrow can one bear?" I ponder with might,
"As grape juice flows towards the east..."
Wait—did I quote that wrong?
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
They sent me this certificate again half a month ago,
saying I broke this world record,
so they're giving me a new one this time.
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
But, but, this jacket is too small,
I can't attach all the velcro patches!
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
Many martial arts masters say, "To learn fighting, first learn to stand."
Indeed, the "horse stance" is considered
the foundation of all martial arts schools.
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
I don't eat that much really,
Just some custard buns, siu mai, har gow,
Boat congee, youtiao, char siu rice rolls, orange peel beef balls—
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
But you know what? I've been thinking about this forever and still can't figure it out:
Why do so many kung fu moves have "horse" in their names?!
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊

content:
Today, I received another one...
If this keeps up, I might just get a
"World Record Holder for Most Certificates" certificate, huh?
info: 闲聊-悠闲生活闲聊-11蛮蛮_单一闲聊
